data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the county of Ashoknagar, Madhya Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Ashoknagar, Madhya Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the county of Ashoknagar prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary: On average, 68 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Ashoknagar, Madhya Pradesh, India.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Lord, the believers in the county of Ashoknagar, Madhya Pradesh, India need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Ashoknagar, Madhya Pradesh, India, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Kayastha Sribastab people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Ashoknagar to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Ashoknagar words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 845,100 citizens of the the county of Ashoknagar.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

location.name: Ashoknagar
location.people_groups_list: Beldar Laria (Muslim traditions), Saur, Lora, Brahmin Srigaud, Brahmin Trivedi Mewada
